DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study determine whether functional fiber , galactooligosaccharide , help maintain immune strength digestive health undergraduate student undergo academic stress ( i.e. , final exam ) . Subjects ask consume fiber placebo day eight week . Immune gastrointestinal health evaluate via daily questionnaire obtain 420 student collection fecal sample subgroup student .
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective , randomize , parallel , double-blind , placebo control design use . Healthy full-time undergraduate student undergo fall 2009 final academic exam recruit University Florida . Informed consent obtain . All subject consent main intervention study subgroup ( n=25/group 75 total ) subject also consent provide two stool sample baseline two stool sample week final exam ( approximately week 4 intervention ) . Subjects stratify base gender randomize ( n=140/group ) receive 0 g , 2.5 g , 5.0 g fermentable fiber , galactooligosaccharides , eight week around time fall final exam . Subjects complete daily online questionnaire ask whether experience cold/flu symptom . Weekly online questionnaire collect information regard gastrointestinal symptom past week . The acute psychological stress associate final exam increase cold/flu symptom . It anticipate student consume galactooligosaccharides versus placebo healthy day ( i.e. , day without cold symptom ) due fiber induce change beneficial bacteria within colon , reduce burden immune system .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old willing complete daily assessment form via computer willing discontinue immuneenhancing dietary supplement ( e.g. , prebiotics fiber supplement , probiotic , echinacea , fish oil , vitamin E > 100 % RDA > 15 mg/day ) willing take fiber 8 week cold last 12 month least 1 final Fall 2009 exam week , Saturday , December 12 Friday , December18 , 2009 daily access computer Internet access entire 8wk study current smoker chronic allergy involve upper respiratory tract ( Chronic = take allergy medicine daily ) allergy milk know illness condition may impact perceived health HIV/AIDS , diabetes , renal gastrointestinal disease receive chemotherapy immune suppress therapy within last year antibiotic therapy past two month cold cold symptom ( day randomization )
